kenticocommunity.qandaanswerdata.QAndAAnswerDataContent:
Firstly, reusable field schemas 🥰😍 this will be a game changer! 💪
---
I have a question around the `Kentico.Xperience.TagManager` package. How does the integration work with GTM?
Does it pass consent parameters for Google Consent Mode (v1 or [v2](https://developers.google.com/tag-platform/security/guides/consent#upgrade-consent-v2 "v2") which will be mandatory for remarketing etc by March 2024)? If not, is this on the roadmap?
Also for custom tags in GTM, does the integration pass through the Kentico consent level, so custom tags can be conditionally triggered based on this level?
